title: Ghislaine Maxwell Judge Orders Hearing Over Whether Juror Lied
sub_head: Juror to be publicly questioned about whether he made false statements during jury selection about previously experiencing sexual abuse
body:
A federal judge granted Ghislaine Maxwellâ€™s motion for a hearing to determine whether a juror lied during jury selection by falsely answering a questionnaire that asked prospective jurors if they had suffered past sexual abuse.
U.S. District Judge Alison Nathan noted in the three-page order made public Thursday that the standard for a post-verdict hearing is high. However, the judge said, it had been met.
